Steal the hammer from House of Hope - If you decline Raphael's offer, want to reclaim your contract, or just do a bit of exploration, you can find the Orphic Hammer in the House of Hope, a hellish domain in Avernus. You will need to defeat Raphael in his own realm. While exploring Guildhall, you can find a note called "Devil's Fee Observer's Report" in Nine Finger's office.
